Serialized Form

  • Package com.lithium.community.android.auth

    • Class com.lithium.community.android.auth.LiAuthorizationException extends java.lang.Exception implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • type

          int type
          The type of the error.
          See Also:
          LiAuthorizationException.TYPE_GENERAL_ERROR, LiAuthorizationException.TYPE_OAUTH_AUTHORIZATION_ERROR, LiAuthorizationException.TYPE_OAUTH_TOKEN_ERROR, LiAuthorizationException.TYPE_RESOURCE_SERVER_AUTHORIZATION_ERROR

        • code

          int code
          The error code describing the class of problem encountered from the set defined in this class.

        • error

          java.lang.String error
          The error string as it is found in the OAuth2 protocol.

        • errorDescription

          java.lang.String errorDescription
          The human readable error message associated with this exception, if available.

        • errorUri

          android.net.Uri errorUri
          A URI identifying a human-readable web page with information about this error.
